verses.text: Lord, you \w were|strong="H1121"\w* good \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H1121"\w* land: changing \w the|strong="H1121"\w* fate \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jacob.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* wrongdoing \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H0776"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* forgiveness; all \w their|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H0776"\w* covered. (Selah.)

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* were \w no|strong="H3605"\w* longer angry: \w you|strong="H3605"\w* were turned \w from|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heat \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* wrath.

\w Come|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*, O God \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* salvation, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w angry|strong="H0639"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* longer.

\w Will|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w being|strong="H0430"\w* angry \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w ever|strong="H7725"\w*? \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* keep \w your|strong="H7725"\w* wrath \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* through all \w the|strong="H7725"\w* long generations?

Will \w you|strong="H0639"\w* not give us life again, so \w that|strong="H1755"\w* \w your|strong="H4900"\w* people \w may|strong="H0639"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* glad \w in|strong="H1755"\w* \w you|strong="H0639"\w*?

\w Let|strong="H8055"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* see \w your|strong="H7725"\w* mercy, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* salvation.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* peace \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* saints; \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* not go back \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* foolish ways.

\w Truly|strong="H3588"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* salvation \w is|strong="H3068"\w* near \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* worshippers; \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* glory \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* land.

Mercy \w and|strong="H0776"\w* faith \w have|strong="H0776"\w* come together; righteousness \w and|strong="H0776"\w* peace \w have|strong="H0776"\w* given \w one|strong="H0776"\w* another \w a|strong="H0776"\w* kiss.

\w Faith|strong="H0571"\w* comes up \w from|strong="H7965"\w* \w the|strong="H7965"\w* earth like \w a|strong="H6298"\w* plant; \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* \w is|strong="H6664"\w* looking down \w from|strong="H7965"\w* heaven.

\w The|strong="H0776"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H0776"\w* give \w what|strong="H6664"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* good; \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* give its increase.
Righteousness \w will|strong="H3068"\w* go before \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w making|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* way \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* footsteps.
